title: Blazing blueberries
caption: Blueberries bring a blaze of colour
desc: Historically, mid-October is peak season for seeing the leaves change colour in Acadia National Park in the US state of Maine. The forest canopy is aflame with autumnal hues and the highbush blueberries on the forest floor provide an additional splash of colour.
